nodes.text: The Steamfields was a geologically active region of the planet Nyriaan.

The Steamfields was the site of various hot springs, geysers and natural vents. A number of species of fungus grew around the edges of the pools within the Steamfields and they emitted phosphorescent light. At the center of the region, the Sith descendents of the crew of the crashed starship Dying Sun constructed an altar.
